org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops

Interface BroadcastOp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Op
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ScalarOp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseBroadcastOp, BaseScalarOp, BroadcastAddOp, BroadcastCopyOp, BroadcastDivOp, BroadcastMulOp, BroadcastRDivOp, BroadcastRSubOp, BroadcastSubOp, ScalarAdd, ScalarDivision, ScalarEquals, ScalarGreaterThan, ScalarGreaterThanOrEqual, ScalarLessThan, ScalarLessThanOrEqual, ScalarMax, ScalarMultiplication, ScalarNotEquals, ScalarReverseDivision, ScalarReverseSubtraction, ScalarSet, ScalarSetValue, ScalarSubtraction

    public interface BroadcastOp
extends Op
    A broad cast op is one where a scalar or less rank array is broadcast to fill a bigg er array. A typical broad cast operation would be adding a row to each row in a matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        int[] getDimension()
        Dimension to do the vector op along. Along dimension 1 for row vector ops, along 0 for column vector ops
